name: Parkour-o Mania
description:
"Parkour-o mania" is a platform game in which players control a character and traverse various levels by jumping over obstacles. The game offers single and multiplayer mode, so players can compete with each other. In addition, the game has a level editor, thanks to which players can create their own maps and share them with other players.

This game is in Early Access. This means that the game is still in development and not yet fully finished. Players can join the game and test new features and levels, but they may also encounter bugs and shortcomings. If you have encountered any, please contact me on Discord (r4lph#1968) or write me an E-mail (rafal.seliga1@gmail.com).
